official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Congress should make additional emergency supplemental appropriations for necessary expenses for enforcement of laws relating to border security, immigration, and customs.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Congress should make emergency supplemental appropriations for necessary expenses for enforcement of laws relating to border security, immigration, and customs.
